channel.title: [Delta] 2 Questions [Delta]
channel.description:
Question one: Can't anybody help with my damn shop problem? i've made about 4 threads and only 1 person helped, but it didn't work.Like wow.
Question 2: How could I make ::noclip ban somebody? Can I just rip my whole ban and use that? just change a few things around?

item.title: [Delta] 2 Questions [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true; i think that should sort question 2.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] 2 Questions [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

ive done digging for you, airscape has the system your looking for. You can probablly get the needed codes off that then modify.

title it noclip then take the ban code and remove the players name code at the end of it so it justs bans Who uses it.

Read full topic
